message: Setup isn't working on my PC
agent_reply: Update to latest version of antivirus

message: I'm having trouble installing the software
I can't connect to the internet
agent_reply: Restart your router and try again
Check app permissions for Local Network

message: App stops working on mobile data
agent_reply: Enable mobile data access in app settings

message: The app isn’t compatible with my phone

agent_reply: Offer a discount on a compatible thermostat
Contact thermostat support for an update

message: The app says my OS is too old
agent_reply: Update to the latest supported OS version

message: It won’t open on my tablet
agent_reply: Use the web version of the app instead
Force Full Sync on both devices

message: My calendar and contacts aren’t syncing

agent_reply: Ensure JavaScript is enabled in browser
